St._Joseph.Washington Township, Doniphan County, Ka:
Washington Township is a township in Doniphan County, Kansas, USA. As of the 2000 census, its population was 3,066.


== History ==
Washington Township was organized in 1855.


== Geography ==
Washington Township covers an area of 34.17 square miles (88.5 km2) and contains two incorporated settlements: Elwood and Wathena.
